name: Gin Rummy Cards Game
description:
Gin Rummy for Free is one of the most popular card games ever. Now you can play with a really smart opponent that will auto-adjust to your playing level. The challenge is always there! And it is 100% Free.

This universal app is made for the best experience on either the iPhone or iPad.

Your goal is to form a hand combining cards into sets of same of a kind or allowed sequences of the same suit reducing while reducing the sum of the remaining cards to 10 points or less.

Features:

- Most Intuitive game out there!
- Auto-sort
- Gorgeous animations
- Auto-save on exit or interruption
- Big easy to see cards
- Superb AI
- Drag and drop
- Themes
- Statistics
- 100% Free!
